snippet.title: Breathedge 2 - Game Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
Revealed at the PC Gaming Show 2023, Breathedge 2 is the sequel to comedy adventure Breathedge, but this time it's less linear and more of a survival sandbox. Build your spaceship, manage your crew, and try to survive on different planets... without any useful skills. Read more on PC Gamer: https://www.pcgamer.com/breathedge-2-reveal-pcgs-2023
